content: For release on delivery  6:40 p.m. EDT  March 18, 2010      Toward an Effective Resolution Regime for Large Financial Institutions         Remarks by     Daniel K. Tarullo     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     Symposium on Building the Financial System of the 21st Century:    An Agenda for Europe and the United States     Armonk, New York    March 18, 2010
